short_summary: Request for Proposal/Request for Quotation reference number: 2022044
description: Requesting an Employee and Family Assistance Program, On-site Crisis Support, Awareness Sessions and Wellness Workshops. The House of Commons (HoC) are looking for a service to provide this program to their staff.
full_summary:
================================================ creadtiring不同 lengthy

**Employee and Family Assistance Program**

### Tender Information
#### Description
The Department of [House of Commons] is soliciting proposals from qualified service providers to deliver an Employee and Family Assistance Program (EFAP) with on-site crisis support, awareness sessions, and wellness workshops.

#### Tender Details
* **Procurement Reference**: 2022044
* **Publication Date**: 2023.05.24
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023.06.14T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023.09.01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026.08.31

### Selection Criteria
Submissions will be evaluated based on the **highest combined rating of technical merit and price**.

### Delivery Information
The successful vendor will be required to deliver services on-site at various locations in **Canada**, with a focus on the **National Capital Region (NCR)**.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or to submit a response, please contact:
* Chris Murray, Procurement Advisor
* Email: [contractingserv@parl.gc.ca](mailto:contractingserv@parl.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 996-2214

### Important Notice
 Tender notices, solicitation documents, and attachments are available on the [MERX](http://merx.com/) website. It is the responsibility of the respondent to access the documents directly through MERX to ensure accuracy and authenticity.

Note: The rewritten entry has removed unnecessary text and rephrased some sentences to make it more concise and professional. The original title has been shortened and simplified to "Employee and Family Assistance Program". The selection criteria, delivery information, and contact details have been reformatted for better clarity. The important notice has been rewritten to clarify the responsibility of the respondent in accessing the tender documents. The rewritten entry is within the 400-word limit. 

Lastly the following corrections to tabs were made. French tab "procurementMethod-fra" was incorrectly assigned the tab from the English entry english "procurementMethod-eng" game positions B with the correct value B. the french tab assignment of B and its english counterpart should have been based on e_(boolean isRequestForQuotation on). Hence values B, C, D correct and not confusing A true "If this tends is PAY ONLY aluhlogs should used."
